description.zh-cn: 清朝光绪帝的皇后，慈禧太后的侄女。清朝及中国历史上最后一位皇太后。在宣统年间垂帘听政，并代表宣统帝溥仪颁布《宣统帝退位诏书》，结束了清朝的统治。
description.en: Empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the niece of Empress Dowager Cixi. She was the last Empress Dowager of the Qing dynasty and in Chinese history. She served as regent during the Xuantong era and issued the Imperial Edict of the Abdication of the Qing Emperor on behalf of Emperor Puyi, ending the rule of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十一位皇帝，孝定景皇后的丈夫和表弟。
description.en: The eleventh emperor of the Qing dynasty, husband and cousin of Empress Xiaodingjing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末期的实际统治者，孝定景皇后的姑姑。
description.en: The de facto ruler of the late Qing dynasty, aunt of Empress Xiaodingjing.

description.zh-cn: 都统，孝定景皇后的父亲，慈禧太后的弟弟。
description.en: A military commander (Dutong), father of Empress Xiaodingjing and younger brother of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 清朝及中国历史上最后一位皇帝，孝定景皇后的养子。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing dynasty and of China, the adoptive son of Empress Dowager Longyu.

en: Imperial Edict of the Abdication of the Qing Emperor

description.zh-cn: 由孝定景皇后以宣统帝溥仪名义颁布，标志清朝统治及中国两千年君主专制政体结束的诏书。
description.en: An edict issued by Empress Dowager Longyu in the name of Emperor Puyi, marking the end of the Qing dynasty's rule and two millennia of imperial monarchy in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个君主制王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 清末民初的军事和政治人物，在清帝退位中扮演关键角色，后成为中华民国大总统。
description.en: A military and political figure in the late Qing and early Republican era who played a key role in the Qing emperor's abdication and later became the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 辛亥革命的开端，直接导致了清朝的覆灭和中华民国的建立。
description.en: The beginning of the Xinhai Revolution, which directly led to the fall of the Qing dynasty and the establishment of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 继承清朝统治中国的国家政权，是亚洲第一个民主共和国。
description.en: The state that succeeded the Qing dynasty in ruling China, and the first democratic republic in Asia.

zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府 (1912年－1913年)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在1912年至1928年间的中央政府。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China from 1912 to 1928.

description.zh-cn: 宣统帝溥仪的生父，清朝末代摄政王。
description.en: The biological father of the Xuantong Emperor Puyi, and the last Prince-Regent of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃子，深受光绪帝宠爱。
description.en: A consort of the Guangxu Emperor, deeply favored by him.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝的妃子，珍妃的姐姐。
description.en: A consort of the Guangxu Emperor, the elder sister of Consort Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝和载沣的父亲。
description.en: Father of the Guangxu Emperor and Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 公共卫生学家，受隆裕太后任命领导了1910-1911年东北鼠疫的防疫工作。
description.en: A public health physician who, appointed by Empress Dowager Longyu, led the efforts to combat the 1910–1911 Manchurian plague.

description.zh-cn: 在清朝末年于中国东北地区爆发的一场严重肺鼠疫。
description.en: A severe pneumonic plague that erupted in Northeast China during the final years of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 一种政体，君主拥有绝对、不受限制的权力。中国的君主专制政体随《宣统帝退位诏书》的颁布而结束。
description.en: A form of government in which the monarch holds supreme, unrestricted authority. The absolute monarchy in China ended with the promulgation of the Imperial Edict of the Abdication of the Qing Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国初年的政治及军事人物，曾任副总统及大总统。
description.en: A political and military figure in the early Republic of China, who served as Vice President and President.

description.zh-cn: 清朝江西巡抚。光绪帝曾意图选择其女为皇后但被慈禧太后阻止。
description.en: Governor of Jiangxi Province in the Qing dynasty. The Guangxu Emperor had intended to choose his daughter as Empress but was stopped by Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是光绪帝的嫡妻皇后。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the primary empress consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 因慈禧太后强行指定婚事，光绪帝厌恶孝定景皇后，夫妻关系不睦。
description.en: Due to the marriage being arranged against his will by Empress Dowager Cixi, the Guangxu Emperor disliked Empress Xiaodingjing, leading to a strained marital relationship.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是慈禧太后之弟桂祥的女儿，即慈禧太后的侄女。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the daughter of Guixiang, the younger brother of Empress Dowager Cixi, making her Cixi's niece.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后选定自己的侄女叶赫那拉氏为光绪帝的皇后，以便监视光绪帝。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi selected her niece, the future Empress Xiaodingjing, to be the Guangxu Emperor's empress in order to monitor his actions.

description.zh-cn: 孝定景皇后是桂祥的长女。
description.en: Empress Xiaodingjing was the eldest daughter of Guixiang.

description.zh-cn: 桂祥是慈禧太后的弟弟。
description.en: Guixiang was the younger brother of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝驾崩后，孝定景皇后成为宣统帝溥仪的养母，并负责抚养他。
description.en: After the death of the Guangxu Emperor, Empress Xiaodingjing became the adoptive mother of the Xuantong Emperor Puyi and was responsible for raising him.

description.zh-cn: 在宣统帝年幼时，作为皇太后垂帘听政，代行国家最高统治权。
description.en: During the Xuantong Emperor's childhood, she ruled as Empress Dowager regent, exercising supreme state power on his behalf.

description.zh-cn: 以宣统帝的名义颁布了《宣统帝退位诏书》。
description.en: Promulgated the 'Imperial Edict of the Abdication of the Qing Emperor' in the name of the Xuantong Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 该诏书的颁布标志着清朝统治的正式结束。
description.en: The promulgation of this edict marked the official end of the Qing dynasty's rule.

description.zh-cn: 该诏书的颁布结束了中国两千多年的君主专制政体。
description.en: The promulgation of this edict ended more than two millennia of absolute monarchy in China.

description.zh-cn: 武昌起义引发了辛亥革命，最终导致清朝覆灭。
description.en: The Wuchang Uprising triggered the Xinhai Revolution, which ultimately led to the downfall of the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 退位诏书将统治权移交给中华民国，为其全国统治提供了法理依据。
description.en: The abdication edict transferred sovereignty to the Republic of China, providing it with a legal basis for national rule.

description.zh-cn: 袁世凯通过与南方革命党进行南北议和，促使隆裕太后同意并颁布退位诏书。
description.en: Through peace negotiations with southern revolutionaries, Yuan Shikai persuaded Empress Dowager Longyu to agree to and issue the abdication edict.

description.zh-cn: 隆裕太后逝世后，北洋政府为其举行了高规格的国葬，并通告全国下半旗致哀三日。
description.en: After Empress Dowager Longyu's death, the Beiyang Government held a high-profile state funeral for her and ordered national flags to be flown at half-mast for three days in mourning.

description.zh-cn: 在隆裕太后逝世后，时任副总统黎元洪致唁电称赞其“德至功高，女中尧舜”。
description.en: After the death of Empress Dowager Longyu, then Vice President Li Yuanhong sent a condolence telegram praising her as having 'the virtue of Yao and Shun among women'.

description.zh-cn: 在宣统朝初期，隆裕太后垂帘听政，摄政王载沣在朝政上辅助她。
description.en: In the early Xuantong era, Empress Dowager Longyu presided over the court from behind a screen, and Prince-Regent Zaifeng assisted her in state affairs.

description.zh-cn: 溥仪是载沣的儿子。
description.en: Puyi was the son of Zaifeng.

description.zh-cn: 珍妃是光绪帝宠爱的妃子。
description.en: Consort Zhen was a favored consort of the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝厌恶皇后而独宠珍妃，导致皇后与珍妃关系不睦。
description.en: The Guangxu Emperor's dislike for the empress and exclusive favor towards Consort Zhen led to an antagonistic relationship between the two women.

description.zh-cn: 八国联军攻入北京后，孝定景皇后与瑾妃一同随慈禧太后、光绪帝逃往西安。
description.en: After the Eight-Nation Alliance entered Beijing, Empress Xiaodingjing, along with Consort Jin, fled to Xi'an with Empress Dowager Cixi and the Guangxu Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 光绪帝是醇亲王奕𫍽的儿子。
description.en: The Guangxu Emperor was the son of Yixuan, Prince Chun.

description.zh-cn: 在东北爆发鼠疫期间，隆裕太后任命伍连德为全权总医官，负责防疫救治。
description.en: During the Manchurian plague outbreak, Empress Dowager Longyu appointed Wu Lien-teh as the chief medical officer with full authority to lead epidemic prevention and treatment efforts.

description.zh-cn: 作为清政府的最高统治者，隆裕太后领导了对东北鼠疫的防疫工作，并最终宣布疫情被肃清。
description.en: As the supreme ruler of the Qing government, Empress Dowager Longyu led the efforts to combat the Manchurian plague and eventually declared the epidemic eradicated.
